actions.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Pitts to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A047).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Pitts to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A047).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment, as offered, prohibits the use of funds for government contractors who discriminate against LGBT employees. As amended by the Pitts amendment, the Federal government must not contravene the 1st Amendment, the 14th amendment, or Article I of the Constitution as it deals with contractors.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of Executive Order No. 13672 of July 21, 2014 ("Further Amendments to Executive order 11478, Equal Employment in the Federal Government, and Executive Order 11246, Equal Employment Opportunity").

description: Amendment amends the Sean Maloney (NY)amendment by clarifying that as Federal funds are spent with regard to contracting, the Administration must not contravene the First Amendment, the Fourteenth Amendment, and Article I of the Constitution.
purpose: An amendment to add the following language to the Sean Patrick Maloney amendment ",except as required by the First Amendment, the Fourteenth Amendment, and Article I of the Constitution".
